name: Grab the box Unreal Test
description:
ALL GAME MADE BY ME

I USED THE FPS PROTOTYPE AND REMADE SOME FEATURES

I CREATE A NEW PROJECTILE TO CAST WITH ANOTHER OBJS(THATS NOT POSSIBLE WITH DEFAULT PROJETCTILE)

A SIMPLE HUD

I CREATED A SIMPLE CATCH ITEM SISTEM WITH A BOX, WAS VERY FUN

THIS PROJECT IS FOR STUDY AND HELP SOME PEOPLE THAT COULD´NT MAKE THIS MECHANICS, AND I DID. 

ENJOY IT.
